h2_title: Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide
content: Most times, he’ll keep his hand in the ground and begin to pulse two more explosions that increase in range, followed by one final blast that’s delayed to lure you in, so be sure to take a breather and heal during this part if needed. While it’s sometimes possible to use the Pillar Stance to rise above the quakes if you are able to unlock the tree, it doesn’t always work, and isn’t recommended.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Most times, he’ll keep his hand in the ground and begin to pulse two more explosions that increase in range, followed by one final blast that’s delayed to lure you in, so be sure to take a breather and heal during this part if needed. While it’s sometimes possible to use the Pillar Stance to rise above the quakes if you are able to unlock the tree, it doesn’t always work, and isn’t recommended.
